languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, авгуры не могут определить точную принадлежность корабля, к которому мы приблизились, однако, судя по телеметрии, это имперское судно. Видим, что корпус значительно поврежден, однако в некоторых отсеках есть воздух — значит, они герметичны. Каковы приказания касательно находки?"

"Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, авгуры не могут определить точную принадлежность корабля, к которому мы приблизились, однако, судя по телеметрии, это имперское судно. Видим, что корпус значительно поврежден, однако в некоторых отсеках есть воздух — значит, они герметичны. Каковы приказания касательно находки?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, it is impossible to determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry reveals the architecture typical of the Imperium fleets. The augur attendants report the hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

"Lord Captain, it is impossible to determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry reveals the architecture typical of the Imperium fleets. The augur attendants report the hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

"Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

"Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

"Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

languages.text: “舰长大人，俄歇扫描无法确定这艘船属于什么人，但遥测数据清楚地显示它是帝国的舰船。虽然舰体已经被严重损坏，但部分舱室内仍有空气，这意味着这些舱室完好无损。关于这个发现，您有何指示？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，俄歇扫描无法确定这艘船属于什么人，但遥测数据清楚地显示它是帝国的舰船。虽然舰体已经被严重损坏，但部分舱室内仍有空气，这意味着这些舱室完好无损。关于这个发现，您有何指示？”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los augures no pueden determinar a quién pertenece la nave, pero la telemetría indica que es una nave del Imperium. El casco ha sufrido graves daños, pero hay aire en algunos compartimentos, lo que indica un sello hermético. ¿Qué ordena que hagamos al respecto?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los augures no pueden determinar a quién pertenece la nave, pero la telemetría indica que es una nave del Imperium. El casco ha sufrido graves daños, pero hay aire en algunos compartimentos, lo que indica un sello hermético. ¿Qué ordena que hagamos al respecto?».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die Auguren können nicht feststellen, wem das Schiff gehört, dem wir uns genähert haben, aber laut Telemetrie ist es eindeutig ein imperiales Schiff. Der Rumpf ist stark beschädigt, aber in einigen der Kammern ist Luft ... das heißt, sie sind hermetisch abgeschlossen. Wie lauten Eure Befehle hinsichtlich dieser Entdeckung?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die Auguren können nicht feststellen, wem das Schiff gehört, dem wir uns genähert haben, aber laut Telemetrie ist es eindeutig ein imperiales Schiff. Der Rumpf ist stark beschädigt, aber in einigen der Kammern ist Luft ... das heißt, sie sind hermetisch abgeschlossen. Wie lauten Eure Befehle hinsichtlich dieser Entdeckung?"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les augures ne parviennent pas à déterminer l'origine du vaisseau, mais les relevés télémétriques indiquent qu'il s'agit d'un navire de l'Imperium. La coque est très endommagée, mais il reste de l'air dans certains compartiments... ce qui signifie qu'ils sont scellés hermétiquement. Quels sont vos ordres concernant cette découverte ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les augures ne parviennent pas à déterminer l'origine du vaisseau, mais les relevés télémétriques indiquent qu'il s'agit d'un navire de l'Imperium. La coque est très endommagée, mais il reste de l'air dans certains compartiments... ce qui signifie qu'ils sont scellés hermétiquement. Quels sont vos ordres concernant cette découverte ? »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、スキャナーでこちらが接近した船の所有者は断定できませんが、遠隔測定器の情報で、対象は帝国の船だと判明しました。船体はひどく損傷していますが、いくつかの部屋には空気があります…つまり、密閉されているということです。この件に関して、いかがいたしましょう？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、スキャナーでこちらが接近した船の所有者は断定できませんが、遠隔測定器の情報で、対象は帝国の船だと判明しました。船体はひどく損傷していますが、いくつかの部屋には空気があります…つまり、密閉されているということです。この件に関して、いかがいたしましょう？」

languages.text: "Alametler, yaklaştığımız geminin kime ait olduğunu belirleyemiyor Lord Kaptan. Telemetriye göre bir İmparatorluk gemisi olduğu kesin. Gövdesi ağır hasar almış ama iç bölümlerinde hâlâ hava bulunuyor. Belli ki hermetik olarak sızdırmaz hâle getirilmişler. Bu keşif konusundaki emirleriniz nelerdir?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the augurs cannot determine who the ship we approached belongs to, but the telemetry clearly reveals it is an Imperium vessel. The hull is badly damaged, but there is air in some of the chambers — which means they are hermetically sealed. What are your orders concerning the discovery?"
